name: Paradise Simulation (low quality) Build 2
description:
I had allocate a lot of memory and downgrade textures to get this level working with itch.io. However, there is still a chance that this won't be able to be played on some browsers or computers. In that case, check out my higher quality standalone, which is downloadable from itch.io as well.

Once you collect all seven batteries you will be transported to the interior.

Full screen option is available and required to see all the UI.
